PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-05982018-05-24IRCC,  ,  , 
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the IMMIGRATION AND REFUGEE PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to strengthen Canada’s ties to the United Arab Emirates as a whole. The lifting of the Temporary Resident Visa requirements will lead to immediate economic benefits through which the increase in the number of business travelers and visitors, will build momentum to expand trade, investment and tourism, strengthen people-to-people ties, and provide lasting benefits for the United Arab Emirates and Canada.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0107 Publication Date: 2018-06-13
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
